column1: Zinc oxide is an ingredient in many products, including certain creams and ointments used to prevent or treat minor skin burns and irritation.
If the person swallowed a lot of zinc oxide, immediately give the person water or milk.
Metal fume fever involves a metallic taste in the mouth, fever, headache, chest pain, shortness of breath, and other symptoms, which start about 4 to 12 hours after exposure.
